00108             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00109             {
00110                   try
00111                   {
00112                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )

00114                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;

00116                         else
00117                         {
00118                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );

00120                   }

00149             function                unsafe_select( $Condition )
00150             {
00151                   try
00152                   {
00153                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00154                         
00155                         return( 
00156                               $this->Database->select( '*' , $this->NativeTable , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition" )
00157                         );

00204                                                                                                                         $Order = false , $Condition = '1 = 1' )

00244                   try
00245                   {

00311             function                create( $Record )
00312             {
00313                   try
00314                   {
00315                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00316                               $Record , 'author:string;recipient:string;subject:string;message:string'
00317                         );
00318                         
00319                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00320                         
00321                         $Fields [] = 'creation_date';
00322                         $Values [] = 'NOW()';
00323 
00324                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00325                         
00326                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00327                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_create_message' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
00328                         
00329                         return( $id );
00330                   }
00331                   catch( Exception $e )
00332                   {
00333                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00334                   }
00335             }
00336             
00359             function                update( $id , $Record )
00360             {
00361                   try
00362                   {
00363                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00364                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00365                               $Record , 'deleted:integer;recipient:string;author:string;subject:string;'.
00366                                     'message:string;`read`:integer' , 'allow_not_set'
00367                         );
00368 
00369                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00370                         
00371                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00372                         {
00373                               $this->Database->update( 
00374                                     $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )"
00375                               );
00376                               $this->Database->commit();
00377                         }
00378                   }
00379                   catch( Exception $e )
00380                   {
00381                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00382                   }
00383             }
